comment.body:
> ekaterina: And in theory the same technique can be used to add comments

That's promising.

> [ekaterina](#comment_11_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD): 

Would a feature to drag todos to different positions be a reasonably easy thing to do?

> [ekaterina](#comment_13_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD): 

Wow you are an amazing person! 
> so I just transfer dummy text, literally the string "dummy"

`return event.dataTransfer.setData("text", "dummy");`

Nice haha

> And I'm going nowhere near a hackintosh, I'm way too paranoid for that. Apple will surely lock me up and force me to say Android is a cheap knockoff.

hahaha :)
